DataElement.preferredName: PRO-CTCAE Version 1.0 79a. Past Seven Days Any Pain, Swelling, or Redness at a Site of Drug Injection or IV Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of whether or not they had any pain, swelling, or redness at a site of drug injection or IV over the past seven days.
